title: Explosive New Vaccine Revelations (Ep 1871)
description:
In this episode, I address the stunning comments by a pharma executive about the COVID vaccine. Also, the FBI is caught up again in a major scandal. 

News Picks:


Twitter censorship targets Florida, but not FDA adviser, for undermining COVID vaccines.

Shocking revelations about FBI misconduct emerge at the Danchenko trial. 


Pfizer executive admits COVID-19 vaccine was never tested to prevent transmission: 'This is scandalous.’

This is what the illegal immigration crisis really looks like.

Black support for democrats is slipping dramatically. 

Republican treasurers are fighting back against Blackrock.


Here are the best places to survive a nuclear war.

George Soros and the “fact-checkers.”
